value:
$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|One of the soldiers... He said that the
castle is in the belly of that huuuuge
volcano.$k$pThat's where they were planning to
take me before I escaped.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Good. That means that this mountain
path must lead straight to the castle's
front gate.$k$pWhere the enemy forces are no
doubt waiting for us, blades at the
ready...$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|I have an idea!$k$pThey locked me in a tower, way up at
the top, and I could see a forest. It
runs alongside the mountains...$k$pIf we sneak through the forest, the
soldiers won't be able to see us
coming, right?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|You're so clever, Ylgr. It is such a
help to have you with us—more than
you could know.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|All right, then! Time's wasting. Surtr is
waiting for us. Let's show him our
resolve!$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Raise your weapons! We must push
through and head to the castle as
fast as we can!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We've dispatched this band of foes.
We must press on—and find Surtr!$k$p

$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Excellent. The time approaches...$k$pHurry to me, foolish children.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Soon, I will see despair burn itself into
your faces—once you understand
how weak you truly are!$k$pHa-hah-hah!$k$p$Sbs150|
